game.name: Squirrel Blast
game.description:
This cute squirrel loves to have his favorite acorns. Your job in this brand adventure game for boys is to help him to shoot through and eat as many acorns as you can. Make sure to keep your eyes on the special gold acorns to increase your score. The challenge is quite tough since plenty of dangerous beasts are waiting for you on the way. Be quick and play smartly to defend him against them in this free online flying game!

Hurry up boys! Get ready to strap on a jetpack and show your skills by blasting your way to a wonderful acorn heaven! It will be amazing to control a cute and lovely flying squirrel who wants to acquire golden acorns. You can use these sparkling golden acorns as ammunition in a tough fighting against your enemies in this one of the best fighting games for kids. Their usage can also be very helpful when it comes to assisting you to progress through the game. 

All you need to do is keep your eyes always on your enemies who might hit you upwardly and downwardly. Also get ready to face other obstacles that can stop you from progressing further. You will also get an opportunity to upgrade your abilities during this super fun game. Use mouse to move your squirrel and shoot your enemies. You can also use WASD to move forward. Make sure to grab the maximum acorns to reach the quota (bottom-left bar) and clear the level of this cool shooting game for children. Check out the health bar on the bottom right of the screen. Good luck to practice your shooting and flying skills to the best in this one of the top squirrel games!
